hooks.name: router-session-entry
hooks.description: Intercepts user prompts and routes through Haiku router for cost optimization

hooks.name: run-observer-pre
hooks.description: Durable run observability (pre): heartbeat + activity for long-running sessions

hooks.name: orchestrator-tool-guard
hooks.description: Prevents orchestrators from running high-fanout repo scans (reduces OOM risk)

hooks.name: router-glob-guard
hooks.description: Blocks non-.claude repo-wide Glob during routing to prevent high-fanout output and CLI OOM

hooks.name: router-completion-handler
hooks.description: Marks router-first routing as completed after router finishes

hooks.name: run-observer-post
hooks.description: Durable run observability (post): append event log and capture failures

hooks.name: security-validation
hooks.description: Validates tool usage for security (blocks dangerous commands)

hooks.name: file-path-validation
hooks.description: Validates file paths on all tools to prevent SLOP

hooks.name: read-size-guard
hooks.description: Blocks oversized Read() calls without paging to prevent token cap errors

hooks.name: skill-injection
hooks.description: Injects skills into Task tool calls

hooks.name: memory-injection
hooks.description: Injects relevant memory before tool execution

hooks.name: audit-logging
hooks.description: Logs tool execution for audit trail

hooks.name: session-cleanup
hooks.description: Cleans up SLOP files and tmpclaude-* files after file operations and Bash commands

hooks.name: memory-capture
hooks.description: Captures tool results for memory storage
